item.title: To Make a Product
item.description: To Make a Product Making a product by yourself can be hard. So I split all the jobs into different roles. So that when you’re doing each role’s job, you have a clear mindset of its duty. CEO Finance Human Profiler Market Product Designer Architect Developer Marketing Operator/Analytics
